name: Sir Hops-a-Lot
description:
Sir Hops-a-Lot Get the high-score in this endless runner!

Programming (Construct 3) and Art (Adobe Animate) by RatFace. Done in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 50 game jam (Theme: Delay the inevitable)

Controls:

Left Mouse button to jump, hold Left Mouse button to glide

OR

W to jump, H to glide

OR

Up Arrow to jump, Z to glide

OR

Tap to jump, hold to glide
